input.sentences: the field trip to organization is a wonderful learning experience for all the students .
the teacher gives them direction on what 's going to be happening on their tour of this organization facility .
a organization representative shows the students a film about the location landing .
the students were given some tests to evaluate their knowledge of the space program .
the students were shown these charts and educated on the conditions the location surface .
output.sentences: OK, kids, here we are at the Museum of Science.
